inclusion.criterion: Rome IV criteria for the diagnosis of IBS
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: investigated to exclude other gastrointestinal organic cause(s)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Moderate-to-severe IBS symptoms, as indicated by a score of ≥175 on the IBS Severity Scoring System (IBS-SSS)
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: The use of antibiotics or probiotics within 1 month prior to FMT
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Immunocompromised patients defined as those treated by immune-suppressive medications
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with co-morbidity such as kidney failure or chronic heart disease
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients with serious psychiatric disorders or drug abuse
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has CLL and large cell transformation, which may be a contraindication for treatment.
